message.item.redstone_panel:
§7Panel to hold tiny redstone bits.
Right click with dye to change color.§r
message.item.redstone_wrench:
§7Right-click a Redstone Panel to rotate.
Left click to remove tiny redstone bits.§r
message.item.redstone_panel_cell: §7Can be placed on a Redstone Panel to form a redstone circuit.§r
message.item.blueprint.full:
§7Right click a Redstone Panel to install this circuit.
Right click the air to export to a JSON file.

§dRequires the following:§r
message.item.blueprint.empty:
§7Right click a Redstone Panel to save the circuit to this blueprint.
Right Click in air to import a circuit from a JSON file.§r
tinyredstone.gui.crash.msg:
This panel has crashed.
Please check your log file,
 and report crash to mod author if possible.
You can only remove components.
Click 'Enable' to attempt to re-enable panel.
